Verses: 1 oru Purushan Than Manaiviyaith Thallivida, Aval Avanidaththilirundhu Purappattuppoi Anniyaburushanukku Manaiviyaanaal, Avan Avalidaththil Inith Thirumbappovaano? Andha Dhesam Migavum Theettuppadumallavo Endru Manushar Solluvaargal; Neeyovendraal Anega Nesarode Vesiththanampanninaai; Aagilum Ennidaththirkuth Thirumbivaa Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

2 nee Medugalinmel Un Kangalai Ereduththu, Nee Vesiththanampannaadha Idam Ondru Undo Endru Paar; Vanaandharaththile Arabiyan Kaaththukkondirukkiradhupola, Nee Vazhi Orangalil Un Nesarukkuk Kaaththukkondirundhu, Un Vesiththanangalaalum, Un Akkiramangalaalum Dhesaththaith Theettuppaduththinaai.
3 adhinimiththam Mazhai Varushiyaamalum Pinmaariyillaamalum Poyitru; Unakko, Sorasthreeyin Netriyirukkiradhu; Neeyo: Naanamaatten Engiraai.
4 nee Idhumudhal Ennai Nokki: En Pidhaave, Dhevareer En Ilavayadhin Adhipadhiyendru Solli,
5 sadhaakaalamum Kobaththai Vaippaaro? Adhai Endrendraikkum Kaappaaro Engiraai Allavo? Idho, Ippadi Nee Solliyum Pollaappugalaichcheydhu, Minjippogiraai Engiraar.

6 yosiyaa Raajaavin Naatkalile Karththar Ennai Nokki: Seerketta Isravel Enbaval Seydhadhaik Kandaayaa? Aval Uyaramaana Sagala Malaiyinmelum, Pachchaiyaana Sagala Maraththinkeezhum Poi, Ange Vesiththanam Panninaal.
7 aval Ippadiyellaam Seydhapinbu: Nee Ennidaththil Thirumbivaa Endru Naan Sonnen; Avalo Thirumpavillai; Idhai Avaludaiya Sagodhariyaagiya Yoodhaa Engira Dhrogi Kandaal.

8 seerketta Isravel Enbaval Vibasaarampannina Mugaandharangal Ellaavatrinimiththamum Naan Avalai Anuppivittu, Avaludaiya Thalludharcheettai Avalukkuk Koduththapodhum, Avaludaiya Sagodhariyaagiya Yoodhaa Engira Dhrogi Bayappadaamal; Ivalum Poi Vesiththanampanninaal, Idhai Naan Kanden.
9 prasiththamaana Avaludaiya Vesiththanaththinaale Dhesam Theettuppattuppoyitru; Kallodum Maraththodum Vibasaaram Pannikkondirundhaal Endraar.
10 ivaigalaiyellaam Kandum, Yoodhaa Engira Avaludaiya Sagodhariyaagiya Dhrogi, Kallaththanamaaith Thirumbinaaleyandri, Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ennidaththil Thirumpavillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
11 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Yoodhaa Engira Dhrogiyaippaarkkilum Seerketta Isravel Enbaval Thannai Needhiyullavalaakkinaal.

12 nee Poi Vadathisaiyai Nokkik Kooravendiya Vaarththaigal Ennavendraal: Seerketta Isravele, Thirumbu Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Ungalmel En Kobaththai Irangappannuvadhillai; Naan Kirubaiyullavarendru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Endraikkum Kobam Vaikkamaatten.

13 neeyo, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaai Dhrogampanni, Pachchaiyaana Sagala Maraththinkeezhum Anniyarode Soramaarkkamaai Nadandhu, Un Akkiramaththaiyum, En Saththaththukku Sevikodaamarponadhaiyum Oththukkol Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

14 seerketta Pillaigale, Thirumbungal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Ungal Naayagar; Naan Ungalai Ooril Oruvanum Vamsaththil Iranduperumaagath Therindhu, Ungalai Seeyonukku Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu,
15 ungalukku En Irudhayaththukku Etra Meyppargalaik Koduppen, Avargal Ungalai Arivodum Buththiyodum Meyppaargal.

16 neengal Dhesaththile Perugip Palugugira Annaatkalile, Avargal Karththarudaiya Udanpadikkaip Pettiyendru Ini Solvadhillai; Adhu Avargal Manadhil Ezhumbuvadhum Illai; Adhu Avargal Ninaivil Varuvadhum Illai; Adhaikkuriththu Visaarippadhum Illai; Adhu Ini Seppanidappaduvadhum Illai Endrukarththar Sollugiraar.

17 akkaalaththile Erusalemaik Karththarudaiya Singaasanam Enbaargal; Sagala Jaadhiyaarum Erusalemil Vilangiya Karththarudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Adhinidamaaga Servaargal; Avargal Inith Thangal Pollaadha Irudhayaththin Ichchaiyinpadi Nadavaargal.

18 annaatkalile Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Isravel Vamsaththaarode Serndhu, Avargal Egamaai Vadadhesaththilirundhu Purappattu, Naan Thangal Pidhaakkalukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduththa Dhesaththirku Varuvaargal,

19 naan Unnaip Pillaigalin Varisaiyile Vaiththu, Janakkoottangalukkulle Nalla Sudhandharamaagiya Dhesaththai Unakkuk Koduppadhu Eppadiyendru Sonnen; Aanaalum Nee Ennai Nokki, En Pidhaave Endru Azhaippaai; Nee Ennaivittu Vilaguvadhillaiyendru Thirumbavum Sonnen.
20 oru Manaivi Than Purushanukku Dhrogam Seyvadhupola, Isravel Vamsaththaaraagiya Neengal Enakku Dhrogamseydhadhu Mey Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
21 isravel Puththirar Thangal Vazhiyai Maarupaadaakki, Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Marandhadhinimiththam Azhudhukondu Vinnappancheyyum Saththam Uyarndha Sthaanangalile Ketkappadum.
22 seerketta Pillaigale, Thirumbungal; Ungal Seerkedugalaik Gunamaakkuven Endraar. Idho, Ummidaththil Varugirom; Neere Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththar
23 kundrugalaiyum Thiralaana Malaigalaiyum Nambugiradhu Virudhaa Enbadhu Mey; Isravelin Ratchippu Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkul Iruppadhu Enbadhu Meyye.
24 indha Lachchaiyaanadhu Engal Siruvayadhumudhal Engal Pidhaakkaludaiya Prayaasaththaiyum, Avargal Aadugalaiyum Maadugalaiyum, Avargal Kumaararaiyum Kumaaraththigalaiyum Patchiththuppottadhu.

25 engal Lachchaiyile Kidakkirom; Engal Avamaanam Engalai Moodiyirukkiradhu; Naangalum, Engal Pidhaakkalum Engal Siruvayadhu Mudhal Innaalvaraikkum Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaagap Paavancheydhom; Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Sollaik Kelaamalumponom.
